1. Premium has added new benefits! Premium can claim at least 2 comics in Premium Center for free reading every 7 days!
2. The function of Favorites has been improved! Membership chapter updates and normal chapter updates will be displayed with different prompts.
3. You can bulk unlock chapters now! Bulk unlock with Gems for the first time and enjoy super discount of 80% off for a limited time!
4. UI optimized.

1. WebComics Mall is now online!
2. Find more surprises in the Mall! Tell you a time-limited offer, you can now exchage Coins for Gems! You can exchange every week for a certain amount of Gems. First come, first serve!
3. Reading Tickets added. You can now use Reading Tickets to borrow or unlock chapters. Tickets can be purchased in the Mall. You can also get Red Tickets in the Mall for free.

Come and take a look!
If you have any suggestions or ideas about the new version, please tell us via feedback section in our app.
